message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper is related to sentiment analysis in natural language processing, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). It also involves machine learning methods for generating numerical scores, which is related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper proposes a novel approach for constructing a lexical resource, which is related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE).
